import React from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; const Cart = () => { const { cart, removeFromCart, updateQuantity, getCartTotal, clearCart } = useCart(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleQuantityChange = (itemId: string, newQuantity: number) => { if (newQuantity < 1) return; updateQuantity(itemId, newQuantity); }; const handleCheckout = () => { navigate('/checkout'); }; if (cart.items.length === 0) { return (

)}
